description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ntm6","text":"This protocol is not intended for amplification of DNA. Rather, it uses the Phi29 DNA polymerase enzyme to turn single stranded DNA (ssDNA) into double stranded DNA (dsDNA). This is required for ssDNA viruses to be sequenced.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cos1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7nda","text":"The procedure should be performed in a fume hood with a UV-light. Prior to starting, the UV-light should be turned on to disinfect the workspace and UV-tolerant materials such as empty PCR-plates, lids, and pipette tips.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jm05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d7if","text":"Whenever working with the samples, keep them on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c81gh","text":"Place materials that tolerate UV-treatment in fume hood and turn on the UV light and recirculation for 30 minutes before use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c829m","text":"Pick up a bucket of ice and thaw samples on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v6i0","text":"Add   DNA in    MQ water to the PCR tube and mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8g2dr","text":"If sample has a concentration below 1 ng/ul, add    of undiluted sample to the tube and mix by pipetting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"A935B0608D9E11ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"3B9D65108D9F11ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"683D58508D9F11ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ln3v","text":"Denature template DNA by 95 degrees for 3 minutes in a ThermoCycler. Directly after, put the samples back on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"coass","text":"Add all   sample content to the MDA cake tube. Keep both sample and cake on ice while transfering the sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6asu1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"A12C63408D9F11ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0fhj","text":"Seal tube with provided lid and briefly centrifuge the sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5thkk","text":"Run sample on a ThermoCycler with the following program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96afc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9co5p","text":"   for   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"289te","text":"   for  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bp6eh","text":"  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F9EA48808D9F11ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"30","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"0238BF808DA011ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0EB8AA208DA011ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0EB8AB028DA011ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"30","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"101BE5978DA011ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ldji","text":"Purify samples with bead purification or store sample at    or   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqrc5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4274AFF08DA011ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4748CD408DA011ECB8E21BB90D233DF5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
